error.backupProfileMismatch: This backup belongs to a different profile.
error.backupUnsupportedFormat: This backup format is not supported.
error.backupInvalid: Backup file is invalid or corrupted.
error.backupTooLarge: Backup is too large to restore safely.
error.backupTooManyFiles: Backup contains too many files to restore safely.
error.dialogUnsupported: This operation is not supported on this platform.
error.hookToaster: useToaster must be used within ToasterProvider
error.profileInvalid: Profile data is invalid or corrupted.
error.vaultUnsupportedOrCorrupt: Vault is corrupted or uses an unsupported format. Try restoring from a backup.
